<tcoratger> Hello everyone,

Just an update to let you know that know the forkchoice is also implemented in Python in the leanspec repo so that we should have exactly the same features in the markdown files and in the Python.

- Python spec: https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanSpec/tree/main/src/lean_spec
- Tests: https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanSpec/tree/main/tests

From now on we will switch towards full Python for each new spec element introduced in the repo so that we avoid confusions, we can create tests directly to test the spec we write and we save time compared to writing the spec in markdown.

Please feel free to submit any PR if you feel something is unclear, missing or wrong.
